targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and (r._field == "usage_system" or r._field == "usage_user") and r.cpu == "cpu-total" and r.host == "africa")
  |> drop(columns: ["cpu","_measurement","_field","_start","_stop"])

from(bucket: "monitor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and (r._field == "usage_system" or r._field == "usage_user") and r.cpu == "cpu-total" and r.host == "america")
  |> drop(columns: ["cpu","_measurement","_field","_start","_stop"])

from(bucket: "monitor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and (r._field == "usage_system" or r._field == "usage_user") and r.cpu == "cpu-total" and r.host == "antarctica")
  |> drop(columns: ["cpu","_measurement","_field","_start","_stop"])

from(bucket: "monitor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and (r._field == "usage_system" or r._field == "usage_user") and r.cpu == "cpu-total" and r.host == "atlantic")
  |> drop(columns: ["cpu","_measurement","_field","_start","_stop"])

from(bucket: "monitor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and (r._field == "usage_system" or r._field == "usage_user") and r.cpu == "cpu-total" and r.host == "jupiter")
  |> drop(columns: ["cpu","_measurement","_field","_start","_stop"])

from(bucket: "monitor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and (r._field == "usage_system" or r._field == "usage_user") and r.cpu == "cpu-total" and r.host == "mercury")
  |> drop(columns: ["cpu","_measurement","_field","_start","_stop"])

from(bucket: "monitor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r._field == "used_percent" and r.host == "africa")
  |> keep(columns: ["device","_time","_value"])

from(bucket: "monitor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r._field == "used_percent" and r.host == "america")
  |> keep(columns: ["device","_time","_value"])

from(bucket: "monitor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r._field == "used_percent" and r.host == "atlantic")
  |> keep(columns: ["device","_time","_value"])

from(bucket: "monitor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r._field == "used_percent" and r.host == "mercury")
  |> keep(columns: ["device","_time","_value"])

from(bucket: "monitor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r._field == "used_percent" and r.host == "antarctica")
  |> keep(columns: ["device","_time","_value"])

from(bucket: "monitor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r._field == "used_percent" and r.host == "jupiter")
  |> keep(columns: ["device","_time","_value"])

import "date"
from(bucket: "monitor")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1m), stop: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStop, unit: 1m))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_sent" or r["_field"] == "bytes_recv")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "africa")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "br0")
  |> difference()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: if r._field == "bytes_recv" then "In" else "Out",_value: (float(v: r._value)*8.0)/60000.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_field","_time","_value"])

import "date"
from(bucket: "monitor")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1m), stop: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStop, unit: 1m))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_sent" or r["_field"] == "bytes_recv")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "america")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "eth0")
  |> difference()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: if r._field == "bytes_recv" then "In" else "Out",_value: (float(v: r._value)*8.0)/60000.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_field","_time","_value"])
